data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Liv! There you are! Come with me!

data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: NOT REAL! HE IS A LIE YOU CREATED!!

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: It's ok... You don't need to worry... Come back to class...

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Look how happy we were... I still have this picture of you...
